Discover the enchanting world of our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candles! This exquisite set includes 16 hand-picked scents designed to evoke a sense of relaxation, rejuvenation, and joy. Intended for your most cherished recipients - Mother, Wife, Daughter, or Friend - each candle is crafted from premium natural soy wax and infused with essential oils that fill any room with their captivating aroma.

Experience the delightful fragrances of Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Blue bell, Wood sage & sea salt, Peony cherry blossom, and English pear & freesia. Our candles burn for 18-20 hours, filling your space with a warm, inviting ambiance.

The elegant tin cans are both recyclable and versatile; they can be repurposed as flowerpots or unique home decorations once the candle has burned out. And with safety in mind, we encourage keeping these treasured gifts out of reach of children and pets when unattended to ensure a peaceful experience for all.

Give the gift of relaxation and tranquility to your Mother, Wife, Daughter, or Friend with this beautiful assortment of scents: Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Blue bell, Wood sage & sea salt, Peony cherry blossom, and English pear & freesia.

The elegantly designed tin cans hold 2.5oz of fragrant soy wax that burns for an impressive 18-20 hours per candle. These reusable containers are not only perfect for lighting your favorite scents but can also be repurposed as flowerpots or charming home decorations.

As a token of our commitment to the environment, we've made sure that these candles are fully recyclable, making them an eco-friendly and sustainable choice for gifting.

Please remember to keep this enchanting collection away from children and pets when unattended, ensuring safety and peace of mind for all involved.

**Description:**

Introducing the 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set, a thoughtful and delightful present for that special someone in your life! This exquisite collection comprises of 16 individually hand-poured soy wax tin candles, each bursting with an intoxicating aroma of the following scents: Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Blue bell, Wood sage & Sea Salt, Peony cherry blossom, and English pear & Freesia.

Each candle boasts a burn time of 18-20 hours, providing your loved one with an extended experience of relaxation, rejuvenation, and delight. Encased within sturdy tin cans, these candles are not only safe but also recyclable ‚Äì making them an excellent addition to their home decor or even serving as a beautiful flowerpot!

The perfect present for mothers, wives, daughters, friends, and beyond, this aromatherapy candle set promises a unique sensory journey that is sure to create cherished memories. So, why wait? Indulge in the world of fragrances and gift an unforgettable experience today!

**Note:** Remember, for safety purposes, keep these candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.
